name: Target (itch) (grusso94)
description:
Target is a proof of concept showcasing a design I had for my final major project.

You play as a test subject in a laboratory, and your target is to try out new weapons and accessories. In the provided level, you are required to use a grappling hook and a gun in order to complete an obstacle course. The faster you are the better the weapons and accessories provided, right?!

This project is heavily inspired by Portal, one of my favourite game series.
